001package gbw.melange.common.builders;
002
003import gbw.melange.common.elementary.contraints.Anchor;
004import gbw.melange.common.elementary.contraints.ElementAnchoring;
005import gbw.melange.common.elementary.types.IElement;
006
007/**
008 * <p>IElementConstraintBuilder interface.</p>
009 *
010 * @author GustavBW
011 * @version $Id: $Id
012 */
013public interface IElementConstraintBuilder<T> extends IPartialBuilder<IElementBuilder<T>>{
014    /**
015     * <p>setContentAnchor.</p>
016     *
017     * @param anchor a {@link gbw.melange.common.elementary.contraints.ElementAnchoring} object
018     * @return a {@link gbw.melange.common.builders.IElementConstraintBuilder} object
019     */
020    IElementConstraintBuilder<T> setContentAnchor(ElementAnchoring anchor);
021    /**
022     * <p>setContentAnchor.</p>
023     *
024     * @param anchor a {@link gbw.melange.common.elementary.contraints.Anchor} object
025     * @return a {@link gbw.melange.common.builders.IElementConstraintBuilder} object
026     */
027    IElementConstraintBuilder<T> setContentAnchor(Anchor anchor);
028    /**
029     * <p>setAttachingAnchor.</p>
030     *
031     * @param anchor a {@link gbw.melange.common.elementary.contraints.ElementAnchoring} object
032     * @return a {@link gbw.melange.common.builders.IElementConstraintBuilder} object
033     */
034    IElementConstraintBuilder<T> setAttachingAnchor(ElementAnchoring anchor);
035    /**
036     * <p>setAttachingAnchor.</p>
037     *
038     * @param anchor a {@link gbw.melange.common.elementary.contraints.Anchor} object
039     * @return a {@link gbw.melange.common.builders.IElementConstraintBuilder} object
040     */
041    IElementConstraintBuilder<T> setAttachingAnchor(Anchor anchor);
042    /**
043     * <p>setPadding.</p>
044     *
045     * @param percent a double
046     * @return a {@link gbw.melange.common.builders.IElementConstraintBuilder} object
047     */
048    IElementConstraintBuilder<T> setPadding(double percent);
049    /**
050     * <p>setBorderWidth.</p>
051     *
052     * @param percent a double
053     * @return a {@link gbw.melange.common.builders.IElementConstraintBuilder} object
054     */
055    IElementConstraintBuilder<T> setBorderWidth(double percent);
056    /**
057     * <p>attachTo.</p>
058     *
059     * @param element a {@link gbw.melange.common.elementary.types.IElement} object
060     * @return a {@link gbw.melange.common.builders.IElementConstraintBuilder} object
061     */
062    IElementConstraintBuilder<T> attachTo(IElement<?> element);
063}
